name: Zumbaja
overview: Zumbaja is a side-view action game similar to Prehistorik. The protagonist of the game is a caveman. The task is to reach all the caves and collect food located there before the time runs out. Opponents such as ghosts, spiders, or sorcerers, and obstacles like spikes or ground holes impede the player character's progress. Every several seconds, a ball will fly out of the right side of the screen. Contact with obstacles and enemies takes away one life. The protagonist uses a club to fight enemies.
